channel.title: Sandpoint|Bonner County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Sandpoint|Bonner County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-2 East/To ID-200 East - Sandpoint
item.description: US-2 East/To ID-200 East in Sandpoint

item.title: US-95 North - Sandpoint Exit
item.description: US-95 north at Sandpoint interchange. Continue north on US-95 north for US-2, Bonners Ferry, and Canada.

item.title: US-95 North - Sandpoint Next Right
item.description: US-95 North approaching south access to Sandpoint. Merge right for access to Sandpoint. This is the southern end of the Sandpoint bypass completed in 2012. Prior to the bypass, all US-95 traffic routed through downtown Sandpoint.

item.title: US-2 West/US-95 South at US-2/US-95 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-95 South (5th Ave.) at US-2/US-95 split (Pine St.). Use US-2 West for Priest River and Sandpoint. Use US-95 South for Coeur d’Alene and Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 South/US-2 West at ID-200
item.description: US-95 South/US-2 West at ID-200 East to Clark Fork.

item.title: US-95 South/US-2 West Approaching ID-200
item.description: US-95 South/US-2 West approaching ID-200. US-95/US-2 traffic must turn right at the intersection.

item.title: Jct. ID-200 on US-95 South/US-2 West
item.description: US-95 South/US-2 West approaching ID-200 jct.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East at ID-200
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at ID-200 jct.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East Approaching ID-200
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East approaching ID-200 East to Clarkfork.

item.title: Jct. ID-200 on US-95 North/US-2 East
US-2 East/US-95 North (Cedar St.) at 5th Ave.
item.description: US-2 East/US-95 North turn left from Cedar St. onto 5th Ave.

item.title: US-2 East/US-95 North Approaching US-2/US-95
item.description: US-2 East/US-95 North (Cedar St.) at US-2 West/US-95 South (5th Ave.) to Priest River and Coeur d’Alene. US-2 East/US-95 north to Bonners Ferry and Canada.

item.title: US-2 East/US-95 North Approaching US-2/US-95
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East approaching US-95 South/US-2 West in Sandpoint. US-95 and US-2 through downtown Sandpoint are one way streets.

item.title: US-2 East/US-95 North - Sandpoint
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East on 1st Ave. north turning left onto Cedar St.

item.title: US-2 East/US-95 South at US-95
item.description: US-2 east at US-95. US-2 joins US-95 north from here to Bonners Ferry. Use US-95 south for Coeur d’Alene and Lewiston. Use US-95/US-2 North for Bonners Ferry and Canada.
